About Me

Let me tell you about myself and what i do

Your project is in safe Hands

As I delved into the world of technology, I found myself fascinated by the intricacies of systems and phones. My curiosity sparked a desire to learn more, despite my background in human kinetics. I'm now embarking on a Level 4 certificate in IT with BCS, building on my foundation in web development. I'm excited to dive deeper into client-side development, mastering vanilla JavaScript before moving on to React. This new chapter in my journey is just beginning, and I'm eager to expand my skills and knowledge in the tech industry.
